definitions: A pre-planned or rehearsed maneuver or action, especially in sports or military contexts.
A scene or part of a work of art, such as a play or film, that is highly elaborate or conventionalized.
A fixed or standard item or feature, often one that is impressive or decorative.
examples: The team scored from a setpiece.
The film's final setpiece was spectacular.
The garden featured several classical setpieces.
